scripts.db:master:config: cat ./master/init.sql | docker exec -i mysql-m mysql -u marcus -pmarcus
scripts.db:slave1:config: cat ./slave1/init.sql | docker exec -i mysql-s1 mysql -u marcus -pmarcus
scripts.db:slave2:config: cat ./slave2/init.sql | docker exec -i mysql-s2 mysql -u marcus -pmarcus
scripts.db:create-table: cat ./startup.sql | docker exec -i mysql-m mysql -u marcus -pmarcus
